titleStmt.title: The four-legg'd elder, or, A true relation of a dog and an elder's maid to the tune of The lady's fall, or, Gather your rosebuds, and fourty other tunes.
titleStmt.author: Birkenhead, John, Sir, 1616-1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in the year 1647 and reprinted 1677 for D. Mallet,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Birkenhead by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
